message.content: Most men in Niger hold negative views towards divorce. They generally believe that divorce is a shameful and dishonorable act that goes against their cultural and religious values. Men in Niger often perceive divorce as a failure to maintain a stable and harmonious family, which is highly valued in their society. They consider divorce as a disruption to the social order and a threat to their reputation and social standing. Consequently, most men in Niger tend to discourage divorce and prioritize maintaining the sanctity of marriage.
